name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Mosaic of Sound and Culture**

Taking place from June 12-14, 2026, Best Kept Secret returns with a lineup featuring 52 artists from 16 countries, celebrating a vibrant spectrum of genres. With strong representation from Electronic, Post-punk, Hip-hop, and Alternative Rock, the festival offers a rich blend of sounds for music lovers. Notable appearances include artists from the USA, Netherlands, and the UK, alongside exciting acts from Ghana, South Africa, and Brazil, showcasing the festival’s commitment to global musical diversity.

This year’s lineup highlights a growing push for inclusivity. While male performers make up the majority, the festival features a notable presence of female, mixed-gender, and non-binary artists. Additionally, 12 performers identify as people of color, reflecting the event’s dedication to amplifying underrepresented voices and fostering a truly multicultural experience.

With an average artist rating of 7.2 and an impressive 98.1% Spotify presence, Best Kept Secret 2026 promises a carefully curated and accessible lineup. From the hypnotic beats of electronic DJs to the raw energy of post-punk and the soulful depth of R&B, the festival is poised to deliver an eclectic and memorable weekend for fans of all musical tastes.
